experiences.title: Researcher - Graph-Based Vocabulary Mismatch Solution
experiences.organization: New York University, Tandon School of Engineering
responsibilities: Investigated graph-based neighbor search and expansion to address vocabulary mismatch in information retrieval
Designed experimental setup evaluating LADR's efficiency in reranking using various initial sets of 200-1000 passages
Testing with multiple dense models (FastB, ColBERT, DeBERTa, and MiniLM) demonstrated pool-based ranking effectiveness
Implemented KNN and HNSW graph-building methods for efficient vocabulary mismatch handling
